verses.verse: ( The LORD Is My Rock) ( 100 22:1-51 ) לַמְנַצֵּ֤חַ׀ <WH5329> lam·naṣ·ṣê·aḥ For the choirmaster. לְעֶ֥בֶד <WH5650> lə·‘e·ḇeḏ the servant יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD, לְדָ֫וִ֥ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ Of David אֲשֶׁ֤ר <WH834> ’ă·šer who דִּבֶּ֨ר׀ <WH1696> dib·ber sang לַיהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh to the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - דִּ֭בְרֵי <WH1697> diḇ·rê - הַשִּׁירָ֣ה <WH7892> haš·šî·rāh song הַזֹּ֑את <WH2063> haz·zōṯ this בְּי֤וֹם <WH3117> bə·yō·wm on the day הִֽצִּיל־ <WH5337> hiṣ·ṣîl- had delivered יְהוָ֘ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD אוֹת֥וֹ <WH853> ’ō·w·ṯōw him מִכַּ֥ף <WH3709> mik·kap̄ from the hand כָּל־ <WH3605> kāl- of all אֹ֝יְבָ֗יו <WH341> ’ō·yə·ḇāw his enemies וּמִיַּ֥ד <WH3027> ū·mî·yaḏ and from the hand שָׁאֽוּל׃ <WH7586> šā·’ūl of Saul. וַיֹּאמַ֡ר <WH559> way·yō·mar He said: אֶרְחָמְךָ֖ <WH7355> ’er·ḥā·mə·ḵā I love You, יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, חִזְקִֽי׃ <WH2391> ḥiz·qî my strength.

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD סַֽלְעִ֥י <WH5553> sal·‘î is my rock, וּמְצוּדָתִ֗י <WH4686> ū·mə·ṣū·ḏā·ṯî my fortress, וּמְפַ֫לְטִ֥י <WH6403> ū·mə·p̄al·ṭî and my deliverer. אֵלִ֣י <WH410> ’ê·lî My God [is] צ֭וּרִי <WH6697> ṣū·rî my rock, אֶֽחֱסֶה־ <WH2620> ’e·ḥĕ·seh- in whom I take refuge בּ֑וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) , מָֽגִנִּ֥י 4043 N-csc│1cs ( mā·ḡin·nî) my shield, וְקֶֽרֶן־ 7161 Conj-w│N-fsc ( wə·qe·ren-) and the horn יִ֝שְׁעִ֗י 3468 N-msc│1cs ( yiš·‘î) of my salvation, מִשְׂגַּבִּֽי׃ 4869 N-msc│1cs ( miś·gab·bî) my stronghold.

מְ֭הֻלָּל <WH1984> mə·hul·lāl [who is worthy] to be praised; אֶקְרָ֣א <WH7121> ’eq·rā I will call upon יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, וּמִן־ <WH4480> ū·min- from אֹ֝יְבַ֗י <WH341> ’ō·yə·ḇay my enemies. אִוָּשֵֽׁעַ׃ <WH3467> ’iw·wā·šê·a‘ so shall I be saved

אֲפָפ֥וּנִי <WH661> ’ă·p̄ā·p̄ū·nî encompassed me; חֶבְלֵי־ <WH2256> ḥeḇ·lê- The cords מָ֑וֶת <WH4194> mā·weṯ of death וְֽנַחֲלֵ֖י <WH5158> wə·na·ḥă·lê the torrents בְלִיַּ֣עַל <WH1100> ḇə·lî·ya·‘al of chaos יְבַֽעֲתֽוּנִי׃ <WH1204> yə·ḇa·‘ă·ṯū·nî overwhelmed me.

חֶבְלֵ֣י <WH2256> ḥeḇ·lê The cords שְׁא֣וֹל <WH7585> šə·’ō·wl of Sheol סְבָב֑וּנִי <WH5437> sə·ḇā·ḇū·nî entangled me; קִ֝דְּמ֗וּנִי <WH6923> qid·də·mū·nî confronted me. מ֣וֹקְשֵׁי <WH4170> mō·wq·šê the snares מָֽוֶת׃ <WH4194> mā·weṯ of death

בַּצַּר־ <WH6862> baṣ·ṣar- In my distress לִ֤י׀ Prep│1cs ( lî) upon אֶֽקְרָ֣א 7121 V-Qal-Imperf-1cs ( ’eq·rā) I called יְהוָה֮ 3068 N-proper-ms ( Yah·weh) the LORD; וְאֶל־ 413 Conj-w│Prep ( wə·’el-) I cried to אֱלֹהַ֪י 430 N-mpc│1cs ( ’ĕ·lō·hay) my God אֲשַׁ֫וֵּ֥עַ 7768 V-Piel-Imperf-1cs ( ’ă·šaw·wê·a‘) for help. יִשְׁמַ֣ע 8085 V-Qal-Imperf-3ms ( yiš·ma‘) He heard מֵהֵיכָל֣וֹ 1964 Prep-m│N-msc│3ms ( mê·hê·ḵā·lōw) From His temple קוֹלִ֑י 6963 N-msc│1cs ( qō·w·lî) my voice, וְ֝שַׁוְעָתִ֗י 7775 Conj-w│N-fsc│1cs ( wə·šaw·‘ā·ṯî) and my cry for His help לְפָנָ֤יו׀ 6440 Prep-l│N-cpc│3ms ( lə·p̄ā·nāw) ... תָּב֬וֹא 935 V-Qal-Imperf-3fs ( tā·ḇō·w) reached בְאָזְנָֽיו׃ 241 Prep-b│N-fdc│3ms ( ḇə·’ā·zə·nāw) His ears.

וַתִּגְעַ֬שׁ <WH1607> wat·tiḡ·‘aš shook וַתִּרְעַ֨שׁ׀ <WH7493> wat·tir·‘aš and quaked, הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> hā·’ā·reṣ Then the earth וּמוֹסְדֵ֣י <WH4144> ū·mō·ws·ḏê and the foundations הָרִ֣ים <WH2022> hā·rîm of the mountains יִרְגָּ֑זוּ <WH7264> yir·gā·zū trembled; וַ֝יִּתְגָּֽעֲשׁ֗וּ <WH1607> way·yiṯ·gā·‘ă·šū they were shaken כִּי־ <WH3588> kî- because חָ֥רָה <WH2734> ḥā·rāh He burned with anger. לֽוֹ׃ Prep│3ms ( lōw)

עָ֘לָ֤ה <WH5927> ‘ā·lāh rose עָשָׁ֨ן׀ <WH6227> ‘ā·šān Smoke בְּאַפּ֗וֹ <WH639> bə·’ap·pōw from His nostrils, וְאֵשׁ־ <WH784> wə·’êš- fire מִפִּ֥יו <WH6310> mip·pîw His mouth; תֹּאכֵ֑ל <WH398> tō·ḵêl and consuming גֶּ֝חָלִ֗ים <WH1513> ge·ḥā·lîm glowing coals בָּעֲר֥וּ <WH1197> bā·‘ă·rū blazed forth. מִמֶּֽנּוּ׃ <WH4480> mim·men·nū came from

וַיֵּ֣ט <WH5186> way·yêṭ He parted שָׁ֭מַיִם <WH8064> ma·yim the heavens וַיֵּרַ֑ד <WH3381> way·yê·raḏ and came down וַ֝עֲרָפֶ֗ל <WH6205> wa·‘ă·rā·p̄el with dark clouds תַּ֣חַת <WH8478> ta·ḥaṯ beneath רַגְלָֽיו׃ <WH7272> raḡ·lāw His feet.

וַיִּרְכַּ֣ב <WH7392> way·yir·kaḇ He mounted עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- ... כְּ֭רוּב <WH3742> kə·rūḇ a cherub וַיָּעֹ֑ף <WH5774> way·yā·‘ōp̄ and flew; וַ֝יֵּ֗דֶא <WH1675> way·yê·ḏe He soared עַל־ <WH5921> ‘al- on כַּנְפֵי־ <WH3671> kan·p̄ê- the wings רֽוּחַ׃ <WH7307> rū·aḥ of the wind.

יָ֤שֶׁת <WH7896> yā·šeṯ He made חֹ֨שֶׁךְ׀ <WH2822> ḥō·šeḵ darkness סִתְר֗וֹ <WH5643> siṯ·rōw His hiding place, סְבִֽיבוֹתָ֥יו <WH5439> sə·ḇî·ḇō·w·ṯāw around Him. סֻכָּת֑וֹ <WH5521> suk·kā·ṯōw a canopy חֶשְׁכַת־ <WH2824> ḥeš·ḵaṯ- ... מַ֝֗יִם <WH4325> ma·yim [and] storm עָבֵ֥י <WH5645> ‘ā·ḇê clouds שְׁחָקִֽים׃ <WH7834> šə·ḥā·qîm -

מִנֹּ֗גַהּ <WH5051> min·nō·ḡah From the brightness נֶ֫גְדּ֥וֹ <WH5048> neḡ·dōw of His presence עָבָ֥יו <WH5645> ‘ā·ḇāw His clouds עָבְר֑וּ <WH5674> ‘ā·ḇə·rū advanced — בָּ֝רָ֗ד <WH1259> bā·rāḏ hailstones וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> wə·ḡa·ḥă·lê- and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ’êš of fire. ( Or bolts of lightning; also in verse 13)

וַיַּרְעֵ֬ם <WH7481> way·yar·‘êm thundered בַּשָּׁמַ֨יִם׀ <WH8064> baš·šā·ma·yim from heaven; יְֽהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD וְ֭עֶלְיוֹן <WH5945> wə·‘el·yō·wn of the Most High יִתֵּ֣ן <WH5414> yit·tên resounded — קֹל֑וֹ <WH6963> qō·lōw the voice בָּ֝רָ֗ד <WH1259> bā·rāḏ hailstones וְגַֽחֲלֵי־ <WH1513> wə·ḡa·ḥă·lê- and coals אֵֽשׁ׃ <WH784> ’êš of fire. ( Most Hebrew manuscripts; some Hebrew manuscripts and LXX do not include —hailstones and coals of fire; see .)

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> way·yiš·laḥ He shot חִ֭צָּיו <WH2671> ḥiṣ·ṣāw His arrows וַיְפִיצֵ֑ם <WH6327> way·p̄î·ṣêm and scattered [the foes]; וּבְרָקִ֥ים <WH1300> ū·ḇə·rā·qîm lightning רָ֝ב <WH7232> rāḇ He hurled וַיְהֻמֵּֽם׃ <WH2000> way·hum·mêm and routed them.

וַיֵּ֤רָא֨וּ׀ <WH7200> way·yê·rā·’ū appeared, אֲפִ֥יקֵי <WH650> ’ă·p̄î·qê The channels מַ֗יִם <WH4325> ma·yim of the sea וַֽיִּגָּלוּ֮ <WH1540> way·yig·gā·lū were exposed, מוֹסְד֪וֹת <WH4146> mō·ws·ḏō·wṯ [and] the foundations תֵּ֫בֵ֥ל <WH8398> tê·ḇêl of the world מִגַּעֲרָ֣תְךָ֣ <WH1606> mig·ga·‘ă·rā·ṯə·ḵā at Your rebuke, יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, מִ֝נִּשְׁמַ֗ת <WH5397> min·niš·maṯ at the blast ר֣וּחַ <WH7307> rū·aḥ of the breath אַפֶּֽךָ׃ <WH639> ’ap·pe·ḵā of Your nostrils.

יִשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> yiš·laḥ He reached down מִ֭מָּרוֹם <WH4791> mim·mā·rō·wm from on high יִקָּחֵ֑נִי <WH3947> yiq·qā·ḥê·nî and took hold of me; יַֽ֝מְשֵׁ֗נִי <WH4871> yam·šê·nî He drew me מִמַּ֥יִם <WH4325> mim·ma·yim waters. רַבִּֽים׃ <WH7227> rab·bîm out of deep

יַצִּילֵ֗נִי <WH5337> yaṣ·ṣî·lê·nî He rescued me מֵאֹיְבִ֥י <WH341> mê·’ō·yə·ḇî enemy, עָ֑ז <WH5794> ‘āz from my powerful וּ֝מִשֹּׂנְאַ֗י <WH8130> ū·miś·śō·nə·’ay from foes כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- - אָמְצ֥וּ <WH553> ’ā·mə·ṣū too mighty מִמֶּֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> mim·men·nî for me.

יְקַדְּמ֥וּנִי <WH6923> yə·qad·də·mū·nî They confronted me בְיוֹם־ <WH3117> ḇə·yō·wm- in my day אֵידִ֑י <WH343> ’ê·ḏî of calamity, וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> way·hî- was יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> Yah·weh but the LORD לְמִשְׁעָ֣ן <WH4937> lə·miš·‘ān my support לִֽי׃ Prep│1cs ( lî) .

וַיּוֹצִיאֵ֥נִי <WH3318> way·yō·w·ṣî·’ê·nî He brought me out לַמֶּרְחָ֑ב <WH4800> lam·mer·ḥāḇ into the open; יְ֝חַלְּצֵ֗נִי <WH2502> yə·ḥal·lə·ṣê·nî He rescued me כִּ֘י <WH3588> kî because חָ֥פֵֽץ <WH2654> ḥā·p̄êṣ He delighted בִּֽי׃ Prep│1cs ( bî) in me.

יִגְמְלֵ֣נִי <WH1580> yiḡ·mə·lê·nî has rewarded me יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD כְּצִדְקִ֑י <WH6664> kə·ṣiḏ·qî according to my righteousness; כְּבֹ֥ר <WH1252> kə·ḇōr according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> yā·ḏay of my hands יָשִׁ֥יב <WH7725> yā·šîḇ He has repaid me לִֽי׃ Prep│1cs ( lî) .

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî·šā- For שָׁ֭מַרְתִּי <WH8104> mar·tî I have kept דַּרְכֵ֣י <WH1870> dar·ḵê the ways יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> wə·lō- and have not רָ֝שַׁ֗עְתִּי <WH7561> rā·ša‘·tî wickedly departed מֵאֱלֹהָֽי׃ <WH430> mê·’ĕ·lō·hāy from my God.

כִּ֣י <WH3588> kî For כָל־ <WH3605> ḵāl all מִשְׁפָּטָ֣יו <WH4941> miš·pā·ṭāw His ordinances [are] לְנֶגְדִּ֑י <WH5048> lə·neḡ·dî before me; וְ֝חֻקֹּתָ֗יו <WH2708> wə·ḥuq·qō·ṯāw His statutes. לֹא־ <WH3808> lō- I have not אָסִ֥יר <WH5493> ’ā·sîr disregarded מֶֽנִּי׃ <WH4480> men·nî ...

וָאֱהִ֣י <WH1961> wā·’ĕ·hî And I תָמִ֣ים <WH8549> ṯā·mîm have been blameless עִמּ֑וֹ <WH5973> ‘im·mōw before Him וָ֝אֶשְׁתַּמֵּ֗ר <WH8104> wā·’eš·tam·mêr and kept myself מֵעֲוֺנִֽי׃ <WH5771> mê·‘ă·wō·nî from iniquity.

וַיָּֽשֶׁב־ <WH7725> way·yā·šeḇ- has repaid יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah·weh So the LORD לִ֣י Prep│1cs ( lî) me כְצִדְקִ֑י 6664 Prep-k│N-msc│1cs ( ḵə·ṣiḏ·qî) according to my righteousness, כְּבֹ֥ר 1252 Prep-k│N-msc ( kə·ḇōr) according to the cleanness יָ֝דַ֗י 3027 N-fdc│1cs ( yā·ḏay) of my hands לְנֶ֣גֶד 5048 Prep-l ( lə·ne·ḡeḏ) in עֵינָֽיו׃ 5869 N-cdc│3ms ( ‘ê·nāw) His sight.

עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- To חָסִ֥יד <WH2623> ḥā·sîḏ the faithful תִּתְחַסָּ֑ד <WH2616> tiṯ·ḥas·sāḏ You show Yourself faithful, עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- to גְּבַ֥ר <WH1397> gə·ḇar ... תָּ֝מִ֗ים <WH8549> tā·mîm the blameless תִּתַּמָּֽם׃ <WH8552> tit·tam·mām You show Yourself blameless;

עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- to נָבָ֥ר <WH1305> nā·ḇār the pure תִּתְבָּרָ֑ר <WH1305> tiṯ·bā·rār You show Yourself pure, וְעִם־ <WH5973> wə·‘im- but to עִ֝קֵּ֗שׁ <WH6141> ‘iq·qêš the crooked תִּתְפַּתָּֽל׃ <WH6617> tiṯ·pat·tāl You show Yourself shrewd.

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> kî- For אַ֭תָּה <WH859> ’at·tāh You עַם־ <WH5971> ‘am- people, עָנִ֣י <WH6041> ‘ā·nî an afflicted תוֹשִׁ֑יעַ <WH3467> ṯō·wō·šî·a‘ save וְעֵינַ֖יִם <WH5869> wə·‘ê·na·yim eyes. רָמ֣וֹת <WH7311> rā·mō·wṯ those with haughty תַּשְׁפִּֽיל׃ <WH8213> taš·pîl but You humble
